snippet: The fire occurred after power was cut and then restored during heavy rain in the early hours of Friday, Phuket’s chief of police said.
abstract: Four people are killed and a dozen more are injured after a fire breaks out inside the Tiger Discotheque, a nightclub on the Thai resort island of Phuket.
lead_paragraph: The fire occurred after power was cut and then restored during heavy rain in the early hours of Friday, Phuket’s chief of police said.

headline.main: Thailand: 4 Die in Nightclub Fire in Phuket
